title: Fun fact about tennis
post: The modern popped collar originated as a way to keep tennis players’ necks from getting sunburnt.

comments.content: I wish working from home was more commonplace. My company sure as hell won't adopt it at all after this, even though the type of job I have makes working from home almost make TOO much sense...

Same. Our CEO is practically creating issues to use as evidence for why telework is not a good policy (never mind that a third of our office was already remote and that most of what we do is done online).

This pandemic could be a major shift in remote work adoption. Hopefully companies realize employees can produce the same level of quality (potentially higher) while working remotely, improving quality of life, and companies saving $$ on expensive office space leases. Plus, fewer emissions in general which is a win for everyone.
Can we get a Helvetica Bold United States and Falcon 9?Also, will the SpaceX logo still be present?
My company doesnt even allowed it now. They are scared that we would keep it that way after covid...
i actually ends up spending more time working when at home. i don’t have to leave at 4pm worried that I might get stuck in traffic.
